TopicTitle: Old secret video footage recovered from the Kerbal Space race Era.

Articles.Content:
(OFF) this is my first atempt to make a music video from Kerbal Space program. That is my first atempt to make a ever video as well...

so... dont mind if its sems kind of crude.

The kerbal Space race was a era of amaziness and discoveries, which memories remais on the minds of dozens of the kerbals.

This is a Top-Secret video recovered from the now extinct Koviet Space Program. It was classified as been lost, but after the secret operation "cleaning in the loft" that ours agents performed in the old loft of doktor Von Kerbin.

we were able to rescue and remasterize this historical valuable material.

Curiosly the kerbals in charge of the final editing process choose to actually make it a kind of Videoclip from the AVICII's Gig "Fading to darkness". Geez...
